// src/components/ProductCard.js import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './ProductCard.css'; const ProductPage = () => { const { productName } = useParams(); // Retrieve the product name from the URL // Sample data to mimic fetching product details const productDetails = { name: "jER™ YX7105", description: "jER™ YX7105 is a liquid-type epoxy resin with toughness, flexibility, and high stretchability...", brand: "jER™ Epoxy (18 products)", polymerName: "Epoxy Resins & Compounds", functions: [ "Adhesion Promoter", "Binder & Resin", "Coupling Agent", "Impact Modifier", "Resin", "Resins, Binders & Matrix Materials" ], chemicalFamily: "Epoxy & Epoxy Derivatives", compatibleSubstrates: [ "Aluminum", "Ceramic", "Concrete", "Fibers & Fabrics", "Glass", "Metal", "Plastics", "Steel" ], applications: [ "Printed electronics (resist ink, build-up wire board, flexible printed wire board, ...", "Semiconductor manufacturing (liquid mold compound, underfill, sidefill, diebonding, ...", "Base film and sheet for wearable devices", "Coatings", "Adhesives" ] }; return (

{productDetails.name}

{productDetails.description}

Brand

{productDetails.brand}

Polymer Name

{productDetails.polymerName}

Functions

    {productDetails.functions.map(func =>
  • {func}
    • )}

Chemical Family

{productDetails.chemicalFamily}

Compatible Substrates & Surfaces

    {productDetails.compatibleSubstrates.map(substrate =>
  • {substrate}
    • )}

Applications

    {productDetails.applications.map(app =>
  • {app}
    • )}

Order details and info over here

); }; export default ProductPage;
